select s.staff_id,s.staff_name,s.sex,d.department_abbreviation,r.role_name,s.state,s.last_time,(select staff_name from staff where staff_id = s.operation_person) operationPersonName from staff s,department d,role r where s.department_id = d.department_id and s.role_identity = r.role_id
and s.staff_name like CONCAT('%',#{staffName},'%')
select staff_id,staff_name from staff where role_identity=4 and state = 1

select s.staff_id,s.staff_name,s.sex,s.state,s.user_name,s.`password`,s.contact_mode,s.last_time,s.role_identity,r.role_name,d.department_abbreviation from staff s,role r,department d where s.role_identity = r.role_id and s.department_id = d.department_id and s.user_name = #{userName} and s.password = #{password}
